page.title: 15SUPERNATURAL - SULLINGTON
page.content: There are several instances of the supernatural in Sullington Parish and even today unexplainable pulsating lights have been seen by scores of people on different parts of the Downs. A ghostly, headless man roams the area and different ghostly animals are seen, the most popular being a galloping horse. It was well known years ago that horses would not pass a certain point on the road between Washington and Storrington. Carters of that time all carried knives to cut the invisible spirits from around the wheels of the cart and around the horses hooves. Even today people still get an eerie feeling near the place.
